question: Show all awards and festivals where Gerardo Prat was on the committee.
sql_query1:
SELECT Festival.name 
FROM Festival
WHERE (Festival.event = "Film Festival" OR Festival.event = "Award") AND Festival.committee_members = "Gerardo Prat"
sql_query2:
SELECT Festival.name 
FROM Festival
WHERE Festival.event = "Film Festival" OR Festival.event = "Award" AND Festival.committee_members = "Gerardo Prat"
interpretation1: Show all awards where Gerardo Prat was on the awarding committee along with the festivals in which Gerardo Prat also participated.
interpretation2: Show all festivals and also show all awards where Gerardo Prat was on the committee.
